text: Nikita Vasilyevich Filatov (; born May 25, 1990) is a Russian professional ice hockey player who is currently a member of Salavat Yulaev of the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL). Filatov was loaned to HC CSKA Moscow of the KHL by the Ottawa Senators of the National Hockey League (NHL) in December, 2011. ==Other websites== * * Russian Prospects Profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Binghamton Senators players Category:Columbus Blue Jackets players Category:Ottawa Senators players Category:Russian ice hockey left wingers Category:Springfield Falcons players Category:Syracuse Crunch players
title: Nikita Filatov
